Hi, I used Melior and Galaxie Polaris when I created the identity for Teedot.  
Check it out on my behance portfolio: [www.behance.net/muggieramadani](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201101202/http:/www.behance.net/muggieramadani "www.behance.net/muggieramadani")
